local_intent: Ensure grape is perceived, set yaw for side approach, compute pinch grasp pose into 'grape_grasp', and verify it is available.
assumptions: Yaw 90 deg aligns tool for side/pinch approach to grape.
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: detect and confirm visibility, set yaw to 90, compute pinch grasp for grape, and verify the grasp key before approach and pick.
